item.description: Dark Knight is playing at 7, big screen!! I've already seen it but can't wait to see Heath at this venue. 6 is an early time to meet, don't worry if you're late, I thought it would be best to get tickets early and get to know each other a bit, and try to stay together as a group. You may want to purchase your ticket in advance... not sure how crowded it will be.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the girl in a bright red T-Shirt and jeans
item.name: Wakefield Weeknights September Meetup
